name: Microsoft Language Interface Pack
summary: Learn about .MLC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Each LIP requires the installation of a base language, which is the source language used to create the translation for the user interface. LIPs often translate only a subset of user interface elements.
NOTE: LIPs must be used by the operating system they support. For example, Windows Vista LIPs cannot be used on Windows 7.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
